text:
Hi. How can we get a loop output like Tensorflow when training a model in Flux?
It would print how many epochs are left and how many seconds are left for each epoch.

elements.text:
Hi. How can we get a loop output like Tensorflow when training a model in Flux?
It would print how many epochs are left and how many seconds are left for each epoch.

text: Have a look at <https://github.com/c42f/TerminalLoggers.jl> and <https://github.com/JunoLab/ProgressLogging.jl/>. Both provide a tdqm-like interface.
